title: Haldia Petrochemicals hopes to restart cracker on Saturday
text:
Haldia Petrochemicals hopes to restart cracker on Saturday

Commodities 1 hour ago (Sep 24, 2019 18:41)

Haldia Petrochemicals hopes to restart cracker on Saturday NEW DELHI, Sept 24 (Reuters) - * India's Haldia Petrochemicals Ltd will restart its napththa cracker on Saturday, a company official said * He said the company had protectively shut the plant on Friday after a fire in one of the pipelines * Haldia Petrochemicals operates a naphtha cracker that can produce more than 600,000 tonnes of ethylene a year

Haldia Petrochemicals hopes to restart cracker on Saturday
description: Haldia Petrochemicals hopes to restart cracker on Saturday
